title: Homicide Investigation - Riverside Park
description: Body of unidentified male found near Riverside Park jogging trail. Apparent gunshot wound. No identification on victim.

persons.name: Unknown Male Victim
persons.description: Male, approximately 35-40 years old, 5'10, dark hair, wearing business casual attire.

persons.name: Elena Rodriguez
persons.statement: I was jogging around 6:30 AM when I found him. I didn't hear any gunshots earlier.

persons.name: Thomas Wright
persons.statement: I saw a dark SUV leaving the parking lot around 5:45 AM. Seemed in a hurry.

evidence.description: 9mm shell casing found 3 meters from body
Victim's smartphone - locked, sent to forensics
